configuration.title: DevToolkit
configuration.pythonPath.description: Path to the Python executable. You can use specific Python version (e.g., 'python3.9') or full path (e.g., '/usr/bin/python3').
configuration.pythonPath.patternErrorMes: The Python path cannot contain whitespace.
configuration.scriptsDirectory.descripti: Main directory for scripts. Supports variables: ${extensionPath}, ${workspaceFolder}, ${globalStoragePath}, ${home}.
configuration.globalStorage.description: Use global storage for dependencies. When enabled, dependencies are installed in a global location shared across workspaces.
configuration.logging.level.description: Log level to control the verbosity of extension logs.
configuration.logging.level.debug: Show all messages including debug information
configuration.logging.file.description: Enable logging to a file. Log files will be stored in the location specified by 'devtoolkit.logging.directory'.
configuration.logging.console.descriptio: Enable logging to the console. Logs will appear in the Output panel under 'DevToolkit'.
configuration.logging.directory.descript: Directory for log files. Supports variables: ${extensionPath}, ${workspaceFolder}, ${globalStoragePath}, ${home}.
configuration.templates.directory.descri: Directory for script templates. Defines where the extension looks for script templates.
Default script template file name. This template will be used when creating new scripts without specifying a template.
List of custom templates. Include file names relative to the templates directory.
configuration.security.allowedPaths.desc: Allowed paths for script execution. Scripts outside these paths cannot be executed for security reasons.
configuration.security.blockedExtensions: Blocked file extensions. Files with these extensions will not be executed, even if they are in allowed paths.
configuration.workspace.scriptDirectorie: Workspace-specific script directories. These directories are added to the script search path for the current workspace only.
configuration.workspace.templateLocation: Workspace-specific template locations. These directories are added to the template search path for the current workspace only.
configuration.workspace.environmentVaria: Workspace-specific environment variables. These variables will be available to scripts run in the current workspace.
configuration.workspace.pythonEnvironmen: Use a Python virtual environment for the current workspace. When enabled, scripts will use the Python interpreter from the specified virtual environment.
Path to the Python virtual environment for the current workspace. Use absolute path or path relative to the workspace folder.
Path to the requirements.txt file for the current workspace. Used for automatic dependency installation in the virtual environment.
